noun.description: A short, sharp sound made by a horn, trumpet, or similar instrument.
A snort of a drug, especially cocaine.
A spell of drinking and lively enjoyment; a spree.
examples: a sales manager on a toot

verb.description: Sound (a horn or similar instrument) with a short, sharp sound.
examples: behind us an impatient driver tooted a horn

origin: Early 16th century: probably from Middle Low German tūten, but possibly an independent imitative formation.
